ApexComponent.description:
Component for "Select Billing Account" 1. Has customizable page name and description
2. Allows the choosing of a new billing account vs. an existing billing account.
3.When "Existing Billing Account" is chosen, allows the user to choose from an existing billing account, and displays the billing account details in a table.
4.Allows the choosing of Quote Type. The options are: New Subscription Quote, Amendment Quote and Renewal Quote
5.Contains a 'Next' and 'Cancel' button. The target URL/Action for both buttons are configurable.
ApexComponent.label: Select Billing Account
